section.name: Input Device: Wii Remote
section.p: The Wii Remote can be used to perform 3D gestures. Gestures are captured while pressing the B button on the backside of the Wii Remote.
section.subsection: A Bluetooth stack that supports the L2CAP protocol is needed to be able to communicate with and use the Wii Remote. The Microsoft Bluetooth stack does NOT support this protocol.
